sourcesContent:
const styles = {
  wrapper: {
    padding: 30,
    maxWidth: 1200,
    margin: "auto",
  },
  title: {
    fontSize: 24,
    marginBottom: 20,
  },
  form: {
    display: "grid",
    gridTemplateColumns: "repeat(2, 1fr)",
    gap: 20,
    background: "#fff",
    padding: 20,
    borderRadius: 10,
    border: "1px solid #eee",
  },
  inputGroup: { display: "flex", flexDirection: "column" },
  input: {
    padding: 10,
    border: "1px solid #ccc",
    borderRadius: 6,
  },
  textarea: {
    width: "100%",
    height: 120,
    padding: 10,
    border: "1px solid #ccc",
    borderRadius: 6,
  },
  sectionTitle: {
    fontSize: 18,
    marginTop: 25,
    marginBottom: 10,
  },
  imageContainer: {
    display: "flex",
    flexWrap: "wrap",
    gap: 15,
  },
  imageBox: {
    width: 150,
    height: 150,
    borderRadius: 8,
    overflow: "hidden",
    position: "relative",
    background: "#fafafa",
    border: "1px solid #ddd",
  },
  image: {
    width: "100%",
    height: "100%",
    objectFit: "cover",
  },
  deleteBtn: {
    position: "absolute",
    top: 5,
    right: 5,
    background: "rgba(0,0,0,0.55)",
    padding: 4,
    borderRadius: "50%",
    color: "#fff",
    cursor: "pointer",
    border: "none",
  },
  addImageBox: {
    width: 160,
    height: 160,
    border: "2px dashed #aaa",
    borderRadius: 8,
    display: "flex",
    flexDirection: "column",
    justifyContent: "center",
    alignItems: "center",
    cursor: "pointer",
    color: "#333",
    marginBottom: 15,
  },
  saveBtn: {
    marginTop: 25,
    padding: "12px 25px",
    background: "#ee4d2d",
    color: "#fff",
    borderRadius: 6,
    border: "none",
    cursor: "pointer",
    fontSize: 16,
  },
};
